Posts.EditableText: > I wish we could do what they do in Katroo.  They sure know how to say "Happy Birthday to You!" \- from Happy Birthday to You! by Dr. Seuss --- If you have the time, won't you please post a rhyme? It might make your two cents seem more like a dime!
Posts.HTML:
I
wish we could do what they do in Katroo.
 They sure know how to say "Happy Birthday to You!"

- from Happy Birthday to You! by Dr. Seuss

If you have the time, won't you please post a rhyme?
It might make your two cents seem more like a dime!

Posts.EditableText:
“A giant albatross swoops down
and scoops you right up off the ground.
She flies away with dreadful grace
and plops you in a dreadful place.“
-excerpt from “A Dragon’s Den”
Posts.HTML:
“A giant albatross swoops down
and scoops you right up off the ground.
She flies away with dreadful grace
and plops you in a dreadful place.“
-excerpt from “A Dragon’s Den”

Posts.EditableText:
All that is extant —
Beauty, angst, love, death, lament —
Art, without intent.
